title: Unity Assembly Definition
description: Defines an assembly in the Unity compilation pipeline

name.description: The name of the assembly being defined

rootNamespace.description: The root namespace of the assembly. Requires Unity 2020.2

references.description: A list of assembly names or assembly asset GUIDs to reference

excludePlatforms.description: Platforms that are explicitly not targeted

autoReferenced.description: When true, this assembly definition is automatically referenced by predefined assemblies (Assembly-CSharp, Assembly-CSharp-firstpass, etc.)

noEngineReferences.description: When true, no references to UnityEngine or UnityEditor will be added to this assembly project

overrideReferences.description: When true, any references to precompiled assembly assets are manually chosen. When false, all precompiled assembly assets are automatically referenced

precompiledReferences.description: A list of precompiled assembly assets that will be referenced. Only valid when overrideReferences is true

defineConstraints.description: A list of the C# compiler define symbols that must evaluate to true in order for the assembly to be compiled or referenced. Absence of a symbol can be checked with a bang symbol (!DEFINE)

optionalUnityReferences.description: Additional optional Unity features to reference

versionDefines.description: A set of expressions that will define a symbol in the C# project if a package or module version matches the given expression

name.description: The package or module that will provide the version to be checked in the expression

expression.description: The semantic version range of the chosen package or module

define.description: The name of the define that is added to the project file when expression evaluates to true
